withhold.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to refuse to give someone something
withhold.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I withheld payment until they had completed the work.
Ian was accused of withholding vital information from the police.
withhold.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to refuse to let someone have something
withhold.translation[1].definitions[0].e: I withheld payment until they had completed the work.
Part of your salary is withheld for income tax.
withhold.translation[1].definitions[1].e: The computer giant has hinted that it has some big plans, but has withheld details.
